languages.text: "Часть десятины я направил{mf||а} на восстановление Простора. Пусть она лучше послужит людям, чем будет вечно гнить в ваших закромах".
"I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."
languages.original_text: "Часть десятины я направил{mf||а} на восстановление Простора. Пусть она лучше послужит людям, чем будет вечно гнить в ваших закромах".

traits.locale_text: "I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your silos forever."
"I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your silos forever."
"I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your silos forever."
"I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."
"I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."

languages.text: "Ich habe einen Teil des Zehnts für den Wiederaufbau der Ausdehnung geschickt. Dort hilft das Geld den Leuten deutlich mehr als in Euren Schatullen."
languages.original_text: "I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einen Teil des Zehnts für den Wiederaufbau der Ausdehnung geschickt. Dort hilft das Geld den Leuten deutlich mehr als in Euren Schatullen."

languages.text: « J'ai utilisé une partie de la dîme pour soutenir l'effort de reconstruction des Étendues. Elle sera plus utile au peuple que si elle pourrissait dans vos coffres pour l'éternité. »
languages.original_text: "I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai utilisé une partie de la dîme pour soutenir l'effort de reconstruction des Étendues. Elle sera plus utile au peuple que si elle pourrissait dans vos coffres pour l'éternité. »

languages.text: “我取走了一部分什一税，用来重建科罗努斯扩区。这些资源可以更好地为人民服务，比烂在仓库里要好得多。”
languages.original_text: "I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."

traits.locale_text: “我取走了一部分什一税，用来重建科罗努斯扩区。这些资源可以更好地为人民服务，比烂在仓库里要好得多。”

languages.text: «Redirigí una porción del diezmo a los esfuerzos de reconstrucción de la Extensión. Así será de ayuda a la población, en lugar de pudrirse en sus arcas eternamente».
languages.original_text: "I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."

traits.locale_text: «Redirigí una porción del diezmo a los esfuerzos de reconstrucción de la Extensión. Así será de ayuda a la población, en lugar de pudrirse en sus arcas eternamente».

languages.text: 「租税の一部をエクスパンス再建のために送った。その方が、君たちの金庫で永遠に腐らせておくよりも人々の役に立つだろう」
languages.original_text: "I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."

traits.locale_text: 「租税の一部をエクスパンス再建のために送った。その方が、君たちの金庫で永遠に腐らせておくよりも人々の役に立つだろう」

languages.text: "Aşarın bir kısmını Enginlik'in yeniden inşasına harcama kararı aldım. Hazinede ebediyen çürüyeceğine insanlara hizmet için kullanılsın."
languages.original_text: "I sent a portion of the tithe for the rebuilding of the Expanse. It will serve the people better than leaving it to rot in your coffers forever."

traits.locale_text: "Aşarın bir kısmını Enginlik'in yeniden inşasına harcama kararı aldım. Hazinede ebediyen çürüyeceğine insanlara hizmet için kullanılsın."
